dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic scene understanding of LiDAR sequences, focusing on urban environments and providing a rich set of labeled data for various tasks in 3D scene understanding.
dcterms:title: Semantic KITTI

dcterms:description: A monocular 3D semantic scene completion benchmark derived from KITTI-360, providing urban scans encoded for semantic scene completion tasks.
dcterms:title: SSCBench-KITTI360

dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at evaluating the robustness and reliability of 3D perception systems against various corruptions, extending popular urban datasets.
dcterms:title: Robo3D
